About.title: No-Excuses Productivity,
About.paragraph: Lock In is the ultimate no-excuses productivity app designed for those who need serious discipline to stay focused. This isn’t just another time management tool—Lock In forces you to commit by holding you accountable with strict time restrictions and real consequences.

Features.title: Minimalist & Distraction-Free
Features.text: A simple, no-nonsense interface designed to keep you locked into your tasks.

Features.title: Unbreakable Time Locks
Features.text: Once you commit to a session, there’s no way out until the time is up. No quitting, no distractions.

Features.title: Monetary Penalties
Features.text: Set real financial consequences for breaking focus. If you fail to stick to your session, you pay the price—literally.

Features.title: No Rewards, Just Discipline
Features.text: Unlike other apps that “motivate” with soft encouragement, Lock In is built for those who need tough accountability.
